features: SKINCARE FOR THE BODY: A daily treatment for odor control formulated with 5% AHA. This clear, quick-dry gel glides comfortably onto skin. Stain-Free. Mess-Free.

CLINICALLY-PROVEN INGREDIENTS: 5% AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acid) helps combat odor, treat discoloration and minimize bumps. Niacinamide helps strengthen skin’s natural barrier. Chamomile Extract helps comfort and soothe the skin.
FORMULA FACTS: Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist-Tested. Non-Comedogenic. Pure Functional Essential Oil Blend. No Aluminum. No Baking Soda. Cruelty-Free. Certified Vegan.

DIRECTIONS: The Deodorant is designed as part of a daily ritual. Apply under arms. When transitioning to an aluminum-free deodorant, it is recommended to apply more than once daily while your body is adjusting.
FOOTPRINT: The Deodorant Gel comes in a recyclable glass bottle. Certified B Corp. Certified Climate Neutral. Certified Plastic Neutral. 1% For The Planet Member. FSC-Certified.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually works!!!
reviews.reviewText: Over the last few years, even without sweating, I can start smelling ripe in my underarms. I think a lot of it is hormonal, but whatever the reason, deodorants weren't helping; if anything, they made it worse. After reading the reviews with skepticism, I thought "well, might as well try this one" even though I knew how angry I was going to be if I was wasting $18 on more disappointment. I couldn't wait to try it, and OMG it worked!!! I live in FL and went to disney for an entire day, and I DID NOT SMELL AT ALL! I truly couldn't believe it, especially since it was the unscented. I have also purchased the Eucalyptus, which is fine, but I prefer the unscented. Both work amazingly though. So, if you are like me and have lost hope in finding something that actually works, it's worth giving it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best deodorant I’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: I have been rotating through regular and natural deodorants for years (dove, Thai crystal, lush, humble, prebiotic, powders, etc).I have extremely sensitive skin and am prone to eczema, most deodorants either don’t work, irritate my skin, or smell terrible.This is the first deodorant I’ve used that reduces sweat, keeps BO in check, doesn’t stain my dark clothes, truly unscented, dries quickly and actually cleared up previous irritation/redness and eczema in armpits.After a couple months of use, it’s still going strong with no issues. It’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I trialed this for 5 months…
reviews.reviewText: I have repurchased this 5 times & I keep on because I’ve been able to find anything like it.Here’s all you need to know:My stats: 28 yr old, woman, active, in shape, trying to treat chronic underarm odorThe product: THIS IS A TREATMENT, Not a DeodorantHow to use: Apply this immediately after getting out of the shower and drying off. Do this right away because once the smell starts, this will not work to treat existing odor. It only continues to work when starting with clean, odor free skin.After it dries, you will need to apply a deodorant on top that will work to stick all day.Results: This works as a treatment pre deodorant in terms of preventing odor or having a very strong one later in the day. For me, this did not work as a solution to my issue but I keep buying it because it helps with initially not smelling but later on in the day it begins to wear off. If I reapply it doesn’t work to treat the new odor. I haven’t found anything that would even help lessen the odor without getting a massive allergic reaction. This gives no reaction even on broken skin. NONE.Conclusion: I am still on the hunt to find a deodorant that will treat my underarm smell without giving me an allergic reaction. I have bought at-least 50 kinds from all different brands and they either don’t work or the clinical strength ones work but I get a horrible rash. I will keep using this as a base treatment to help to lessen the odor but even for that it is very expensive. Until I find the magic one that does both, I’ll continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! IF YOU STILL STINK, I MIGHT HAVE THE SOLUTION FOR YOU!
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! Helped to even out my skin tone and keeps me odor free after 3+ years of dealing with stinky armpits.I was dealing with very bad odor in my armpits that I just could not get rid of after having kids. I gave the unscented version of this deodorant a try and with the first two uses, I still stunk. But I now even when I sweat, I smell NOTHING.If you feel like you still stink try these steps!1) Start using an exfoliating mitt lightly in your armpits. The deodorant already has AHA to exfoliate so you don’t want to over exfoliate and irritate the skin. But you do want to make sure you’re cleaning off all the bacteria and gunk that any stick deodorants and clothes were leaving behind2) apply this deodorant nightly so that it gets the chance to absorb without the extra sweating. Apply in the morning if you feel like you need itSweat is generally supposed to be odorless so if you stink, chances are there is stuff that’s gunked up in the area that is causing you to stink. So just find a better cleaning device. A loofah and washcloth didn’t cut it for me. I switched to a Korean exfoliating mitt and this deodorant was able to work its magic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not great for odor
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE:I'm giving this a 1 star. It did not hold the smell but I believe made me smell musty-er. I did not see much changes using this. I decided to just stick with the toner because it actually helps with odor control, color, and boils and many other things. This was way too expensive and did nothing for me within the 3 bottles I bought. I could literally say, I gave this a trail period and this last bottle I'm not even finishing it. Out here smelling like a grown man after 5 hours of basketball practice smh. I would let it dry before i put on a shirt and on some days, if I'm not doing much activity at all (just in a car and out, less then 30 mins walking) it might last but it is not worth it for me. I did not see much difference in the color of my underarm and I was not consistent with the tumeric soap or the toner, only I was consistent with this. I can't say much about any boils or bumps underarm because it truly also depends on your intake of foods. Since I consume more sugar and dairy, I had a few more breakouts and I can't blame this for not preventing that.I'm using this for some weeks now. I nearly gave up on it week 1 because it did not help with odor, especially in the heat wave we had. It didn't even last 30 mins. Im not sure about the lightened of the arms yet but that's why I'm sticking with it. I use another deodorant at times and use this when I know I'm not going to sweat too much. Hopefully I can come back and give results on how my underarms lightened up. I'm using this and tumeric soap. Also I use a toner from ordinary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved at First
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited about this product! When I started using it it worked great! I loved the scent, I loved how it went on, and how it kept body odor at bay. After about 2 weeks of using it daily I developed a terrible skin irritation under my arms and have not been able to use it since as my skin is still healing. Maybe I’ll have to have a deodorant rotation so it doesn’t irritate my skin with prolonged use. I’m not sure what is in it that has caused the irritation but it did leave a large red rash all over my under arm.
